name: Toybox Bedlam
description:
UPDATE: Version 1.1 released - Level skip glitch fixed. Also now available for Macs!

Get ready for 9 levels of inflatable busting, toy collecting, box pushing and firework abusing festive mayhem in TOYBOX BEDLAM! A Christmas themed physics game. 

It's early December at the Kooj Inc toy factory, their only forklift has broken down - so they need someone to help out ship all the boxes of toys! You control Gobot, the little Godot themed robot. On the way you'll navigate obstacles, solve basic physics puzzles and help bring Christmas to the factory. You even get to meet a drunken Santa!

Supports both Keyboard and Dualshock gamepad control. This game is meant to be played in one sitting as it has no save feature, but it's a short experience that only takes around half an hour. It's also got a very schmaltzy ending, but hey, it's Christmas.

Use WSAD to move Gobot, Spacebar to fire Fireworks (once you've picked them up) and press R to restart level if you get stuck.

Heads up to all streamers: as far as I am aware, there is no copyrighted music in this game. The music for this game was made by Kevin McLeod, TeknoAxe, HeatleyBros Music (whos great work you can find on their Youtube channel!) and Scott Holmes Music, and none should be Copyright struck by any Twitch or Youtube bots. 

Also, credit goes out to Thola Studio on Itch.io for the animated Gobot model - thanks dude!
